channel.title: [PI] Make a npc teleport you
channel.description: I'm new to PI and need help with how to make a npc teleport you. Basically i want Martin Thwait (npc id - 2270 ) Teleport me to 3165 9629 when i click on him. If anyone can tell me how to do that it would be very helpfull or just make a code for me.

item.title: [PI] Make a npc teleport you
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

I Vain I:

Actually the code had two errors. You capitalised ‘case’ and you forgot a period after the ‘getPA()’ constructor.

pwnd lol ur awesome ivaini

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Make a npc teleport you
item.dc:creator: @Anc13nts253 Anc13nts253
item.description:
@Anc13nts253 wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=Anc13nts253 link=topic=474568.msg3470161#msg3470161 date=1295226576]
Actionhandler

I believe it would be something like…

Case 2270: c.getPA()movePlayer(3165, 9629, 0); break;
Close, but you have a few errors.

Class: ActionHandler
Location: src>server>model>players;
Method: firstClickNpc();
Statement:

case 2270:
    c.getPA().movePlayer(3165, 9629, 0);
    break;

[/quote][/quote]

The code didn’t have any errors. I just didn’t tell him where to place it.

Read full topic
